papers.title: A randomized controlled trial of metformin in type 2 diabetes
papers.abstract: This study evaluates the efficacy of metformin in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus. A total of 200 patients were randomized to metformin or placebo.

papers.title: Metformin in pediatric diabetes: a case report
papers.abstract: We report a case of metformin use in a 10-year-old child with type 2 diabetes.

papers.title: A randomized controlled trial of metformin in type 2 diabetes
papers.abstract: This study evaluates the efficacy of metformin in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus. A total of 200 patients were randomized to metformin or placebo.

papers.title: Systematic review of diabetes medications
papers.abstract: We systematically reviewed literature on diabetes medications including metformin, sulfonylureas, and insulin.

papers.title: Insulin therapy in type 1 diabetes
papers.abstract: This study examined insulin therapy outcomes in type 1 diabetes patients.
